japanese:
お兄ちゃん、おかわりいる？
ほしいものあったら取るから言ってね。
translation:
Big bro, do you want seconds?
I'll get you anything you want, just tell me.

japanese: ああ、ありがとな。
translation: Yeah, thanks.

japanese:
あ！　お茶がなくなってるね。
はい、ついであげるよ。
translation:
Ah! You've run out of tea.
Here, I'll get you more.

japanese:
らいは、気を遣ってくれるのは嬉しいが、
お前もちゃんと食うんだぞ？
translation:
Raiha, I'm happy that you're paying attention to me,
but make sure to eat something, okay?

japanese:
大丈夫、私もちゃんと食べてるよ。
ありがと、お兄ちゃん。
translation:
Don't worry, I'm eating enough.
Thanks, big bro.

japanese: 二乃、また見てる。
translation: Nino's staring again.

japanese:
今日は、らいはちゃんを
観察するつもりなのでしょうか？
translation: Is she going to observe Raiha-chan today too?

japanese: あっ！　口元が汚れてる。
translation: Oh! Your mouth is dirty.

japanese: ん？　どこだ？
translation: Hm? Where?

japanese: ちょっと待って、動かないで……。
translation: Hold on, don't move...

japanese: はい、取れた。
translation: Okay, I got it.

japanese:
まったくもう、お兄ちゃんは
私がいないとダメなんだから。
translation:
You know, big bro,
without me you'd've been in huge trouble!

japanese:
そうだな、らいはがいないとな。
俺もまだまだだからな。
translation:
That's right, Raiha.
I still can't do anything on my own.

japanese:
いいなぁ……。
上杉さん、らいはちゃんから
毎日こんな風にしてもらってるんですか？
translation:
How nice...
Uesugi-san,
is Raiha-chan treating you like this every day?

japanese: ああ、俺はらいはの兄だからな！
translation: Yeah, because I'm her big brother!

japanese:
う、羨ましいですっ！
私もなんとかしてらいはちゃんを妹に……！
translation:
I-I'm so jealous!
I want Raiha-chan to be my little sister!

japanese: こらこら、無理言わない。
translation: Hey now, don't wish for the impossible to happen.

japanese:
というか四葉にだって妹がいるじゃない。
ねえ、五月ちゃん？
translation:
But, you have a little sister,
don't you, Yotsuba?
Right, Itsuki-chan?

japanese: ええっ！？
translation: Whaaat?!

japanese:
四葉がほしいのは、妹じゃなくて
らいはちゃんだと思う。
translation:
What Yotsuba wants isn't just a little sister,
she wants Raiha-chan.

japanese:
ふっ、五月がらいはのように
振る舞うのは無理だろうからなぁ。
translation: Heh, it'll be impossible for Itsuki to be like Raiha.

japanese:
ど、どうしてあなたが、
そんなに勝ち誇った顔をしているのですか！
translation:
Wh-why do you have
such a triumphant look on your face?!

japanese:
くっくっく、俺は勝ち組だぞ？
らいはの兄として生まれた時点で圧倒的な勝ち組だ！
translation:
Hahaha, 'cause I'm the winner here, you know?
It's an overwhelming victory for me,
having been born as Raiha's older brother!

japanese: もー、お兄ちゃんってば。
translation: Oh, come on, big bro.

japanese:
本当のことだ。
らいはが家事を引き受けてくれるからこそ、
俺は心置きなく勉強に集中できる。
translation:
It's true.
Because Raiha takes care of the housework, I can
concentrate on my studies without worrying about it.

japanese: らいはなくして、今の俺は存在しないんだ。
translation: If it wasn't for Raiha, I wouldn't be who I am now.

japanese:
えへへ……。
じゃあ、もっとお兄ちゃんを助けられるように
私も頑張るからね。
translation:
Ehehe...
Then, I'll do my best to help you even more, big bro.

japanese:
ああ！
らいはのために、俺は俺の実力を
限界まで高めてみせる！
translation:
Yeah!
For you Raiha, I'll push my abilities to the limit!

japanese: すごい……フー君がこんなに……。
translation: Amazing... Seeing Fu-kun, so excited...

japanese: やっぱりこの方向で行くしかないわね。
translation: Yes, this is the only way for me to proceed.

japanese:
なんだ、二乃。
人の顔をじっと見て。
translation:
What is it Nino?
Why are you staring at me?

japanese:
あ……。
ううん、その……。
translation:
Ah...
No, um...

japanese:
フー君は本当にらいはちゃんが大事なのね。
話を聞いてて、しみじみそう思って。
translation:
Raiha-chan is just so important for you, Fu-kun.
I got that impression just by listening to you.

japanese: なんだ、お前も羨ましいのか？
translation: What, are you jealous too?

japanese:
そうじゃなくて。
フー君にとってらいはちゃんって
大事っていうか……特別なのよね？
translation:
Not that.
To you, Fu-kun, Raiha-chan is very important...
or maybe even special, right?

japanese:
当たり前だろう、妹だからな。
らいはにはいつも世話になってる。
感謝してもしきれない。
translation:
Obviously, because she's my little sister.
Raiha is always taking care of me.
I can't thank her enough.

japanese:
だかららいはは、俺にとって
誰よりも大切で特別な存在なんだ。
translation: For me Raiha is more important than anyone else.

japanese: ふーん……。
translation: Hmm...

japanese:
ありがと、フー君。
よくわかったわ。
translation:
Thank you, Fu-kun.
I got it.

japanese:
当たり前だ。
そんな問いかけは愚問だな。
translation:
Obviously.
What a foolish question.

japanese: 俺にとってらいはは、誰よりも大切な妹だ！
translation:
For me, my little sister Raiha is more important than 
anyone else.

japanese: 誰よりも……なのね。
translation: More than anyone...you say.

japanese:
そうだ。
俺を支えてくた分、いつか必ず幸せにして
やらねばならないと思っている。
translation:
That's right.
Someday, I'll make it up to her and help her on her 
path to happiness.

japanese: そう……。
translation: Right...

japanese:
ありがと、フー君。
よくわかったわ。
translation:
Thank you, Fu-kun.
I got it.

japanese: 兄だからな。
translation: Cause I'm her big brother.

japanese: 兄だから？
translation: Because you're her big brother?

japanese:
俺はらいはの兄として、
幸せになるのを見届ける義務がある。
translation:
As Raiha's big brother,
I have an obligation to make sure that she is happy.

japanese:
だから、困っていたら手助けをするし
望めばなんでもやってやる。
それが兄妹というものだ。
translation:
Therefore, if she's in trouble, I'll help her,
and grant her any wish.
That's what our relationship is all about.

japanese:
……そっか、そうよね。
兄として……か。
translation:
...I see, is that so.
As her big brother...huh.

japanese:
ありがと、フー君。
よくわかったわ。
translation:
Thank you, Fu-kun.
I got it.

japanese: ホント？　よくわかった？
translation: Really? You understand?

japanese: ええ、ありがとね。
translation: Yes, thanks.

japanese:
そっかー！
よかったぁ～。
translation:
I see!
Glad I could be of help.

japanese: 五月？
translation: Itsuki?

japanese:
あの、なんとなくですが……
今の二乃の笑顔……どことなく嫌な予感が……。
translation:
Um, I just kinda get it...
But how Nino's smiling right now...
I feel something a little strange about it...

japanese: んー、実は私もちょっとね？
translation: Hm, yeah something is off.

japanese: 目が変にすわってた気がする。
translation: Her eyes kinda sparkled.

japanese: 気のせいだと思いたいのですが……。
translation: I hope I'm just imagining things...

japanese: なに話してるの？
translation: What are you talking about?

japanese:
い、いえ！
なんでもありませんよ、なんでも！
translation:
N-nothing!
Absolutely nothing at all!

japanese: ……本当に、なんでもないといいけど。
translation: ...Really, it'd be nice if it was nothing.
